name: The Dark Side of the Moon (itch) (MF Project)
name_original: The Dark Side of the Moon (itch) (MF Project)
description:
*download PC version for better performance*

Made for BenBonk Game Jam #3

Help 2 bunnies on different sides to get carrots.

controls

- move [arrow]

- jump [space]

- switch sides [Z]
